thread.title: Graham Joins Mutual Benefit Group as Senior Claims Representative
thread.title_full: Graham Joins Mutual Benefit Group as Senior Claims Representative - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Graham Joins Mutual Benefit Group as Senior Claims Representative
text:
Senior Claims Representative Paul Graham will serve Maryland area for Mutual Benefit Group.
Huntingdon, Pennsylvania (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Paul Graham joined Mutual Benefit Group as senior claims representative on September 21, 2015. In this role he is responsible for investigating, evaluating, and negotiating settlement of multi-line claims in Baltimore City and Eastern Maryland.
Graham earned a bachelor’s degree from Towson University and has also earned the Associate in Claims (AIC) designation from The Institutes.
Mutual Benefit Group is a regional property/casualty insurance carrier headquartered in Huntingdon, Pennsylvania, that has been providing coverage for personal autos, homes, and businesses since 1908. The company’s insurance products are underwritten through its member companies, Mutual Benefit Insurance Company and Select Risk Insurance Company. Rated A- (Excellent) by A.M. Best, Mutual Benefit serves nearly 75,000 policyholders in Pennsylvania and Maryland through 250 independent insurance agents.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb12998237.htm
